Summary Note:
Kuhn Roth Werner and the RM crossed paths at a tech conference in Zürich. They attended several keynote sessions together and realized they had a shared vision for the future of technology investments.
Kuhn Roth Werner is a 44 year old Startup Founder from Switzerland. He has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
Attracted by Julius Baer's reputation for excellence, he chose to join for the bespoke financial solutions offered.
Family Background: Kuhn Roth Werner is married to Gisèle. Together they have 2 kids called Schneider and Frey.
Education Background:
Kuhn obtained his secondary school diploma from Gymnasium am See Kreuzlingen in 1998.
Kuhn pursued higher education at Suffolk University in Geneva, graduating in 2004.
Occupation History:
Kuhn Roth Werner is a 44 year old and comes from Switzerland.
Kuhn Roth Werner began his professional journey as a Software Developer at Google Switzerland GmbH in 2005, laying the foundation for future success.
He then transitioned to Microsoft Schweiz GmbH as a Startup Founder, leveraging his expertise to drive results from 2009 till now.
Wealth Summary:
During his work, he focused on financial growth, making diverse investments and ultimately saving 330000 CHF.
His remarkable portfolio comprises 3 stunning properties. Situated in prime locations across Lucerne, Zurich and Chur, these assets demonstrate their sophisticated understanding of real estate investments and high-end lifestyle preferences.

In addition to his career success, he also received an inheritance of 2340000 CHF from his late mother, a renowned Stock Trader, in 2012.
Client Summary: The RM knows the client very well and is a good friend of the entire family.
